Ottoman Ramadan at DoubleTree

During the month of Ramadan, the L2 Restaurant will get this special Arabic touch – a hint of tradition infused by Turkish dishes finished off with the tales of the Ottoman Empire. There is a small story behind every dish on the menu. The most famous one is about “Hünkar Beğendi” – a dish out of 100 chosen by the Sultan himself several decades ago. Culinary excellence with more than 70 Ottoman dishes will be provided by the best chef that Turkey has to offer: Chef Samil – all the way from Izmir. He is the master of Ottoman dishes, simple in design but amazing in taste. Enjoy Iftar for QAR155 per person and Sohour for QAR175 per person.

2017-05-28

#I AM EVO SUMMER CAMP



			20% OFF 5 Uber Taxi Rides. Download Uber Mobile application and use promocode:EVENTSDOHA20 *Offer for first time riders with Uber
			

Our #IamEvo Camps are designed to challenge young athletes to progressively develop their skills, performance and confidence. The courses are structured to meet the needs of all young players, to have fun, learn new skills and meet new friends in a safe and friendly environment. Members have a choice of venue, with camps held at Doha College Al Waab and Doha College West Bay.


Our camps are open to boys and girls aged 4-16 years and run from 8 am to 1 pm daily at each site.





Registration Now Open


Non-Members please click here – https://www.evopg.com/clubsys/register/
Members, please click here – https://www.evopg.com/clubsys/members/

Oryx Rotana – Ramadan Spirit at Choices الدوحة –  إفطار رمضان


			20% OFF 5 Uber Taxi Rides. Download Uber Mobile application and use promocode:EVENTSDOHA20 *Offer for first time riders with Uber
			
It will soon be Ramadan and Oryx Rotana Doha beckons families and groups with exciting promotions. To honor this special time of year, Oryx Rotana Doha offers an unforgettable taste of Arabian culture in our different venues for Iftar and Suhour. Experience authentic Middle Eastern cuisine and feel the spirit of the Holy Month.
Ramadan Spirit at Choices
Iftar: Enjoy a lavish Oriental Iftar every Sunday, Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday, with ouzi, cold mezzeh, shawarma, live mixed grill station and more from Iftar time until 11:00 PM for QR 195 per person. Buffet includes local water, Ramadan juices, Arabic coffee and Moroccan tea.
Oriental Butcher’s Night: Every Tuesday, choose your size, your cut, your style and enjoy all you can meat! For QR 220 per person. Buffet includes Ramadan juices, Arabic coffee and Moroccan tea.
Oriental Catch of the Day Night: Every Thursday, indulge in traditional Middle Eastern style seafood in a perfect family ambience. There is nothing like having a dinner buffet with grilled local fish, whole baked fish, seafood sayadiyah, etc. for just QR 260 per person. Buffet includes local water, Ramadan juices, Arabic coffee and Moroccan tea.
يعد شهر رمضان من الأشهر المميزة، بحيث يجمع الناس ويقربهم من بعض. إجتمع مع العائلة والأصحاب للإستمتاع بشهر رمضان مع روتانا.
إنضم الي أكثر موائد الافطار تميزا في الدوحة مع المقبلات العربية والحلويات الرمضانية ولا تنسى ليلة الستيك كل ثلاثاء وليلةالطعام البحري كل خميس

Colour Grading with Tashi Trieu: Davinci Resolve Training Course


			20% OFF 5 Uber Taxi Rides. Download Uber Mobile application and use promocode:EVENTSDOHA20 *Offer for first time riders with Uber
			
The course provides an introduction to colour grading and the popular grading software, DaVinci Resolve. It is the ideal course for editors, digital imaging technicians, directors of photography, visual-effects technicians, aspiring colourists, and anybody with a desire to explore colour correction.
This course is geared towards beginners who have never used the Davinci Resolve software platform or have some limited experience with colour correction. Users who are familiar with colour grading in another platform or have some experience with Resolve will certainly benefit.
The two-day workshop consists of group tutorials that cover the process and theory of Colour Grading, Hollywood-style practices, and the operational side of Resolve. This will include practical training on colour workflows, grading approaches and techniques, case studies, and practical examples; and advisory sessions in small groups that allow participants to practice what they have learned.
Dates: 24 and 25 July, 2017 1:00 PM to 6:00 PM
For more information, please visit our website.

2017-05-21

Señorita’s shine bright at the season ending Latin Ladies night.
Have your best friends and family gather at the 4th floor of the St. Regis to savour 2 handcrafted sips from your favorite bartender.
Feel the Caribbean vibes all night long with los 2’D de Cuba performing from 9pm till late.
Arrive before 10pm to have the chance to win some amazing prizes including a pair of Salsa n Candela heals.
Stay around for the best Tropicana club remix before we close our doors.
Date: This Tuesday Only
Time: 7pm-Until Late.*
Dress Code: Strictly Fabulous – Latin Vibe…
Entrance: NO ENTRANCE FEE
For additional information and table reservations, please call 44460105 or email doha.butler@stregis.com

			20% OFF 5 Uber Taxi Rides. Download Uber Mobile application and use promocode:EVENTSDOHA20 *Offer for first time riders with Uber
			
Ramadan Spirit at Al Nafourah Garden
Al Nafourah Iftar: Break your fast with selected cold, hot mezze, main course & dessert at QR 185 inclusive of water. Starting from Iftar time. Top up with energizing mocktails starting from QR 35.   BOOK NOW
Ramadan Tent

With the summer season and upcoming Ramadan, Oryx Rotana Doha opens to the public the new pergola at Al Nafourah Garden. The venue is pulling out all the stops with its spectacular fountain view and a friendly welcoming environment. It offers a whole host of menus designed to mark your experience in style.
